name: Wash Clothes
description: Start your entrepreneurial journey by washing clothes for your neighbors. It's honest work that builds character and capital!

name: Sell Airtime
description: Everyone needs airtime! Set up a small booth and help people stay connected while earning steady profits.

name: Charge Phones
description: Power is precious! Offer phone charging services to people whose devices have died. A modern necessity business.

name: Boda Boda Ride
description: Hit the streets on a motorcycle taxi! Navigate traffic and transport passengers quickly around the city for good money.

name: Sell Rolex
description: The famous Ugandan street food! Roll eggs and vegetables in chapati for hungry customers. A delicious profit maker.
